sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: green-to-red fluorescent timer derivative of DsRed (Terskikh et al., 2000)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Timer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Timer

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: We constructed pMitoTimer by inserting the BamHI-NotI fragments of pTimer-1 (Clontech) into pDsRed2-Mito (Clontech) vector digested with BamHI and NotI using T4 ligase (New England Biolabs) following DNA isolation by using the Qiaex II gel extraction kit (Qiagen). The mitochondrial targeting sequence of the human cytochrome c oxidase subunit VIII (Cox8) gene from pDsRed2-Mito was then fused to the mutant DsRed1-E5 on the N-terminus.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CMV-F
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Human CMV immediate early promoter, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CMV-F

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Expresses mitochondrial targeted DsRed1-E5 as reporter for mitochondrial content, structure, oxidative stress and damage in vitro and in vivo .

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: NeoR/KanR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: NeoR/KanR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to neomycin, kanamycin, and G418 (Geneticin(R))

Laker RC, Xu P, Ryall KA, Sujkowski A, Kenwood BM, Chain KH, Zhang M, Royal MA, Hoehn KL, Dirscoll M, Adler PN, Wessells RJ, Saucerman JJ, Yan Z. J Biol Chem. 2014 Mar 18. 10.1074/jbc.M113.530527 PubMed 24644293
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:tagFusionProtein: human cytochrome c oxidase subunit VIII mitochondrial targeting sequence (N terminal on insert)
